text: wiseonjadeul-i geudae(muhammadeu)ege wass-eul ttae geudeul-eun “ulineun sillo geudaega hananim-ui sadoim-eul jeung-eonhabnida” lago malhana hananimkkeseoneun sillo geudaega geubun-ui sadoim-eul algo gyesimyeo hananimkkeseoneun sillo wiseonjadeul-i geojismalhaneun jadeul-im-eul jeung-eonhasinola
